Chicago Code Camp 2

April 2010 · wordpress, republished, wayback, chicagocodecamp, events

Originally published on WordPress on April 12, 2010. View original article.

Archive note: Originally published on just3ws.wordpress.com. Republished from an archived Wayback snapshot.


Hey, live in or near Chicago? Are you a software developer? Do you like software? Do you just like going to places where other people are? Then you will LOVE the Chicago Code Camp.

Scores of developers from the greater Chicago-land area presenting on topics ranging from Clojure to Ruby to Java to C#. Good time is guaranteed or your money back. Wait, did I mention it is a free event?

More details at http://chicagocodecamp.com. Stay tuned for more details on speakers and sessions.

Big announcement for today? .NET Rocks! will be broadcasting LIVE from the Chicago Code Camp!
